tags.name: xtal-frappe-chart
tags.description: Web component wrapper around the cool Frappe chart (https://frappe.io/charts) library.
tags.jsDoc:
/**
 * Web component wrapper around the cool Frappe chart (https://frappe.io/charts) library.
 * @element xtal-frappe-chart
 * @event selected-element-changed - fires when user selects chart data element
 */

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description:
Any component that emits events should not do so if it is disabled.
Note that this is not enforced, but the disabled property is made available.
Users of this mix-in should ensure not to call "de" if this property is set to true.
attributes.jsDoc:

         * @attr

properties.name: evCount
properties.description: Tracks how many times each event type was called.

properties.name: newDataPoint
properties.description: Add new data point to chart

events.name: selected-element-changed
